channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024010348
item.description:
Report X-2024010348

  • City: MIDDLETOWN

item.title: Report X-2024010322
item.description:
Report X-2024010322

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-26
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was observed to be leaking prior to loading into delivery van. Package was removed from workflow and brought to QA cage for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Inner bottles have loose caps, leaked. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.

item.description:
Report X-2024010150

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE DISCOVERED WITH WET SPOT IN SORT ASILE AND INSPECTED BY DMP FOR LEAKAGE. INSPECTION FOUND UNDELCARED HAZMAT CORROSIVE LIQUID, ACID, INORGANIC, N.O.S. - 4 X 1 GALLON CONTAINERS WITH 1 HAVING A LOOSE CAP.
